title.rendered: How to Automatically Hide Explicit Photos

content.rendered:
Did you know you can automatically hide explicit photos on your Android device with Cover? Instead of manually sorting through private photos and hiding them in a separate app, Cover does the heavy-lifting for you. The app’s AI will automatically detect any explicit content and block it from sight, plus store it away in your passcode protected private photo vault.

Cover was developed back in 2018 with privacy & security top of mind. We knew the world didn’t need just another secret photo vault app ー it needed an all-in-one photo vault.

What Makes Cover Different?

Cover isn’t your regular secret calculator app or photo vault. It’s a superior solution for all things private content. Cover is compatible with most Android phones & tablets and quite literally solves the need of most private content problems you might possibly have. It’s features are unparalleled. Here’s a high-level overview of how the app functions:

  • Auto-Hide™: Auto-Hide™ is the proprietary technology that powers Cover. With Auto-Hide, Cover is able to detect any explicit photos or videos. Once detected, the AI will block it immediately and immediately hide it to your private vault. 
  • Smart Notifications: We know you don’t want to make a scene of explicit content, which is why we made Cover’s notifications discreet.
  • Real-time Messaging Protection: Even your messages will be protected with Cover. If someone sends you an inappropriate photo or video the app will immediately sensor the photo before you can even see it. 
  • Fully Encrypted: Cover is built with end-to-end encryption, which means only you can see and access your content. No one else will be able to view your photos or videos, nor will be able to access them illegally.

With Cover, your device is equipped to automatically hide explicit photos and videos, whether or not you know it’s on your device. Cover is able to do this by our unique machine learning technology. Cover quite literally monitors your device constantly, so you don’t have to. 

The app blocks unsolicited photos in messaging apps like Messenger and keeps your photo gallery clean at all times. You’ll never look at an unsolicited d*ck pic or explicit photo that you didn’t ask to receive again.

To start automatically hiding explicit photos & videos on your Android device, all you need to do is download the app on the Google Play Store. 

Once you’re in the app, set your sensitivity levels to ensure the strength of the algorithm is at the level of your needs, and set up your passcode to your own private encrypted photo vault. 

Once you’re set up, all you need to do is keep Cover installed on your device and let it take care of the rest. 

Try Cover for Free Today!
